trans-unit.source: To implement a custom upgrade acceptor, inherited from this <xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""></xref> base class.
trans-unit.target: Para implementar um aceitante de atualização personalizada, herdada neste <xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""> </xref> classe base.

trans-unit.source: An example of a stream upgrade is to build a compression stream directly on top of the transport stream.
trans-unit.target: Um exemplo de uma atualização de fluxo é criar um fluxo de compactação diretamente sobre o fluxo de transporte.

trans-unit.source: This class is used with <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider> to implement a custom stream upgrade.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe é usada com <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider>para implementar uma atualização de fluxo personalizados.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator>

trans-unit.source: For a detailed description of the upgrade process, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição detalhada do processo de atualização, consulte <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Upgrades the transport stream and returns the upgraded stream.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza o fluxo de transporte e retorna o fluxo atualizado.

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to wrap the existing transport stream by providing additional capabilities; for example, a compressing stream.
trans-unit.target: Esse método pode ser usado para encapsular o fluxo de transporte existente fornecendo recursos adicionais; Por exemplo, um fluxo de compactação.

trans-unit.source: The stream to be upgraded.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo a ser atualizado.

trans-unit.source: Returns the upgraded stream.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o fluxo atualizado.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous version of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade*>.
trans-unit.target: Versão assíncrona do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade*>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade*>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the remarks for <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte os comentários para <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade%2A>

trans-unit.source: The stream to be upgraded.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo a ser atualizado.

trans-unit.source: The method to be called when the <xref uid="langword_csharp_AcceptUpgrade" name="AcceptUpgrade" href=""></xref> call has completed.
trans-unit.target: O método a ser chamado quando o <xref uid="langword_csharp_AcceptUpgrade" name="AcceptUpgrade" href=""> </xref> chamada é concluída.

trans-unit.source: State information for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_AcceptUpgrade" name="AcceptUpgrade" href=""></xref> call.
trans-unit.target: As informações do estado de <xref uid="langword_csharp_AcceptUpgrade" name="AcceptUpgrade" href=""> </xref> chamar.

trans-unit.source: Returns a result code that is passed into EndAcceptUpgrade to access the upgraded stream.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um código de resultado que é passado para EndAcceptUpgrade para acessar o fluxo atualizado.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the upgrade requested is supported by this upgrade acceptor.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a atualização solicitada é suportada por esta atualização aceitante.

trans-unit.source: The developer can inspect the requested content type and determine whether the resulting upgrade can be performed by this upgrade acceptor.
trans-unit.target: O desenvolvedor pode inspecionar o tipo de conteúdo solicitado e determinar se a atualização resultante pode ser executada por essa atualização aceitante.

trans-unit.source: This content type comes from the `GetNextUpgrade` method on the matching upgrade initiator.
trans-unit.target: Esse tipo de conteúdo é proveniente de `GetNextUpgrade` método no iniciador atualização correspondente.

trans-unit.source: The type of content to be checked.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de conteúdo a ser verificada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this kind of upgrade is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se houver suporte para esse tipo de atualização; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous version of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade*>.
trans-unit.target: Versão assíncrona do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade*>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade*>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the remarks in <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte os comentários no <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade%2A>

trans-unit.source: The IAsyncResult returned from <xref uid="langword_csharp_BeginAcceptUpgrade" name="BeginAcceptUpgrade" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O IAsyncResult retornado de <xref uid="langword_csharp_BeginAcceptUpgrade" name="BeginAcceptUpgrade" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the upgraded stream.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o fluxo atualizado.
